modShortDescription: This mod adds a visual effect to the "buffInjuryBleeding" buff. Now the bleeding in the 7 Days to Die will be more realistic.
modDescription:
This mod adds a visual effect to the “buffInjuryBleeding” buff. Now the bleeding in the 7 Days to Die will be [more](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-more-slots/) realistic.

[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/TSBX-7D/Modlets/tree/master/TSBX_visibleBleeding)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8169-tsbx-collection/).

**Credits:** [TSBX](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/tsbx/)
